attributes.action: hold a referendum on current & future spending on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: now is it just me or im i missing a trick here? 1/ no matter how much money is poured into this black hole it will never be enough? 2/ no one is now accountable as there are so many layers of office staff! 3/ all i hear about is non-nationals using the service and not paying in before? 4/its all a postcode lottery service as well? 5/ even when i dont use the service as much as im should when i do i still have to pay at the end for a prescription? 6/ and what is wrong with people taking responsibilty for themselves/family and paying for there own care? 7/ and how much is it now to go to dentist? 8/ now im sure there are more points but im NHS outed

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
